basics.name: Londy Tong-Lee
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am a student at UH Manoa who graduated with an ACM Animation Track and is currently earning ICS BA. Expected graduation 2023. After graduation, my plans are to work in the video game industry or go explore the world.

courses: ICS 141: Discrete Math I for CS
ICS 241: Discrete Math II for CS

work.summary: Student fiscal assistant that works on daily sales
highlights: Matching invoices, balancing daily sales, etc.

work.summary: Assists customers with various questions and picking out books for them.
highlights: Assisting customers in store with questions and restocking books.
Answer phone calls with book inquiries and other questions.

volunteer.organization: Wasabi Magazine. (Under manga artist Kazuo Maekawa)
volunteer.summary: Manga assistant for local manga project
highlights: Learned and improved on the art of manga.
Taught younger kids how to draw art and manga.
Animated assets for children's math game
Learned some JavaScript and programmed of the game mechanics.

awards.title: Manoa Merit Scholarhip
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.5 at a Hawai'i public school.

awards.title: Dean's List
awards.summary: Undergraduate students are awarded the Dean's List distinction if they: (1) earn a semester grade point average of 3.5 or higher based on 12 credits or more taken for a grade (C/NC courses do not count), and (2) do not receive grades of W, I, F, or NC for that semester.
